name: Wolf Tails
summary: "Wolf Tails" is a visual novel where you take care of two wolf-girls. There's Mirari, a kindhearted girl who is running away from her duties to her pack, and Fuyu, a brash and loud-mouthed girl who is wary of human culture and its "influences".
info:
• 平台: pc
  • 游戏类型: avg
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018年5月4日
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/822930/Wolf_Tails/
  • 发行: Razzart Visual
  • 开发: Razzart Visual
